prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as an ultra-realistic high-fashion beauty portrait. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. Fair skin with natural freckles, radiant dewy texture, visible pores. SKIN: Natural glow, slightly parted lips. ADD: Model holds a vanilla ice cream cone close to lips, small amount of white cream carefully applied to lower lip. Calm expression, looking directly at camera. SETUP: Studio lighting, soft diffused light, subtle highlights on skin. Dark blurred background with soft bokeh. Shot on 85mm f/1.8, shallow depth of field. High-end beauty photography, Vogue style. Natural color correction, cinematic contrast. Hyperrealistic skin texture. 4:5 format.
